mapper.insert: insert into city_activity(title, start_time, end_time, province, city, address, detail, cost, uid, time, participants_num, status) values(#{title}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{province}, #{city}, #{address}, #{detail}, #{cost}, #{uid}, #{time}, #{participants_num}, #{status})
mapper.update: update set title = #{title}, start_time = #{start_time}, end_time = #{end_time}, province = #{end_time}, city = #{city}, address = #{address}, detail = #{detail}, cost = #{cost}, uid = #{uid}, time = #{time}, participants_num = #{participants_num}, status = #{status}
mapper.select: select * from city_activity where title like "%"#{city_activity.title}"%" and start_time > #{city_activity.start_time} limit #{start}, 20
select * from city_activity where start_time > #{city_activity.start_time} limit #{start}, 20
select * from city_activity where province = #{city_activity.province} and start_time > #{city_activity.start_time} limit #{start}, 20
select * from city_activity where city = #{city_activity.city} and start_time > #{city_activity.start_time} limit #{start}, 20
select * from city_activity where #{city_activity.province} >= cost and start_time > #{city_activity.start_time} limit #{start}, 20
select * from city_activity where status = #{city_activity.status} limit #{start}, 20
select count(*) from city_activity where start_time > #{city_activity.start_time} limit #{start}, 20
